Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/63rd
ShortDescription: Due to street blockage at 63rd Street Beach , 63 63rd buses will only provide service to Stony Island/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to street blockage at 63rd Street Beach , #63 63rd buses will only provide service to Stony Island/63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cermak-Chinatown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Cermak-Chinatown. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains continue to stand at Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing at Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested between 54th/Cermak and Central Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
